title: Pixel 3 XL that is 2 years old and has swollen battery and separating back. How to talk to support
content:
My phone is just over 2 years old and technically out of warranty. I read where people have been able to get a free replacement due to the defect.
But I can't find a way to talk to support to request this. I either get to where it says I'm out of warranty or I just keep looping around the "how to contact us" and getting the same pages of info with no contact link.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
